name: Sokolor
description:
Paint yourself and push the cubes of the same color!

Mix colors!

To walk on the colored tiles you need to be in the same color...

The cubes also need to be the color of the tile!

You can remove the paint if you need to!

Customize your character!

Features:


🔴 ​100 handcrafted levels.
🟡​ Original soundtrack.
🔵​ Minimalist interface.
⚪ Undo option.
🟢​ Sokoban with an innovative mechanic.
🟠​ Cute characters.
🟣 10 colors to discover.
⚫ Customize your character.
